channel.title: I want to learn this
channel.description:
I want to learn how to get information from text boxes, dropdown boxes, checkboxes, and radio boxes.
I want to do in HTML, unless you can't.
Where would I go about learning this.
I know I could google it but I'd rather know about where you learned it because most of you guys seem highly knowledgeable in HTML and php.

item.title: I want to learn this
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Way to all reply really, really lately.

Read full topic

item.title: I want to learn this

the bank:

http://www.google.ca/search?q=learn+html+or+php+or+whatever+the+fuck+you+want

POST and GET action

item.title: I want to learn this

[quote=“mwiebelhaus, post:1, topic:247910”]I want to learn how to get information from text boxes, dropdown boxes, checkboxes, and radio boxes.

I want to do in HTML, unless you can’t.

Where would I go about learning this.

I know I could google it but I’d rather know about where you learned it because most of you guys seem highly knowledgeable in HTML and php.[/quote]You’d either use Javascript/PHP.

And you can just go to like… w3shools. They have basic/moderate tutorials on errything.

item.title: I want to learn this
item.dc:creator: @imjohn10 imjohn10
item.description:
@imjohn10 wrote:

www.w3schools.com is a good place to learn about HTML, JavaScript, CSS etc

http://www.w3schools.com/js/default.asp
http://www.w3schools.com/dhtml/dhtml_examples.asp
http://www.w3schools.com/htmldom/dom_examples.asp

May also be handy to you.

Read full topic
